committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy and Poultry

official_title: To require that the Secretary of Agriculture include an estimate of the cost to produce milk whenever the Secretary announces the basic formula price for milk to be used under Federal milk marketing orders.
short_title: True Cost of Dairy Farming Act of 1997

summary.text: True Cost of Dairy Farming Act of 1997 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to include an estimate of milk production costs in announcing the basic formula price for milk.

titles.title: True Cost of Dairy Farming Act of 1997

To require that the Secretary of Agriculture include an estimate of the cost to produce milk whenever the Secretary announces the basic formula price for milk to be used under Federal milk marketing orders.
